targets.rawSql:
SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
avg(v_aggr_avail) as "Available"
from fasalt.tifasaggr
where
--n_aggr ='Aggr2_8TB_N2'
n_aggr ='Aggr1_4TB_N1'
and
to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
order by avg(v_aggr_avail) desc;

SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
avg(v_aggr_avail) as "Available"
from fasalt.tifasaggr
where
n_aggr ='Aggr2_8TB_N2'
--n_aggr ='Aggr1_4TB_N1'
and
to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
order by avg(v_aggr_avail) desc;

SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
 avg(v_aggr_used)::numeric(5,2) as "Used (TB)"
 from fasalt.tifasaggr
 where
 n_aggr = 'Aggr1_4TB_N1' 
 and
 to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
  or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
   or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
    or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
     or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
      or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
       or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
        or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
 --and n_vol ='vol_VMWDS_PROD_01_vol_mirror'
 group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
 order by avg(v_aggr_used) asc
;

SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
 avg(v_aggr_used)::numeric(5,2) as "Used (TB)"
 from fasalt.tifasaggr
 where
 n_aggr = 'Aggr2_8TB_N2' 
 and
 to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
  or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
   or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
    or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
     or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
      or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
       or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
        or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
 --and n_vol ='vol_VMWDS_PROD_01_vol_mirror'
 group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
 order by avg(v_aggr_used) asc
;

SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
avg(v_vol_avail) as "Available"
from fasalt.tifasvol
where
to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
order by avg(v_vol_avail) desc;

SELECT TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month') AS "Month",
 avg(v_vol_used)::numeric(5,2) as "Used (TB)"
 from fasalt.tifasvol
 where 
 to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-03%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-04%'
 or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-05%'
  or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-06%'
   or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-07%'
    or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-08%'
     or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-09%'
      or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-10%'
       or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-11%'
        or to_char(d_backup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '2022-12%'
 --and n_vol ='vol_VMWDS_PROD_01_vol_mirror'
 group by TO_CHAR(d_backup, 'Month')
 order by avg(v_vol_used) asc
;

SELECT
d_backup, v_vol_total as "Total (TB)"
from
fasalt.tifasvol
where
n_vol ='vol_VMWDS_PROD_01_vol_mirror'
order by d_backup;
